document_data.caption: A map showing the location of the ganra ye-do.
document_data.name: The flaming seas
document_data.mainbody:
'''Ganra ye-do''', or '''"the flaming seas"''' was an area of sea lying south of the southwestern tip of the [[Koryo Peninsula]] in [[Koryo]], [[Kara-Tur]].

The [[Muradi Lighthouse]] at the end of the peninsula was maintained to warn of ganra ye-do.The source does not say what exactly ganra ye-do is.
